H0.text: Reduce heat transfer is what dark objects, as compared to lighter colored objects, do, which is why Kendra advises her mom that a car with a black exterior will be uncomfortable in summer.

H1.text: Are generally more dense, dark objects, as compared to lighter colored objects, cause a black car to become uncomfortable in summer, which explains why Kendra advises her mom that a black exterior will be uncomfortable in the summer.

H2.text: Absorb more of the Sun's energy explains why Kendra advises her mom that a car with a black exterior will be uncomfortable in summer while she is purchasing a car.

H3.text: Reflect sunlight more efficiently is why a car with a black exterior is uncomfortable in the summer, as dark objects, compared to lighter colored objects, reflect sunlight more efficiently.
